label: Horton, Tammy & Michael H. Thurston.  2014. A revision of the bathyal and abyssal necrophage genus Cyclocaris Stebbing, 1888 (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Cyclocaridae) with the addition of two new species from the Atlantic Ocean. Zootaxa 3796(3): 507–527.
